title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 55-3.6 - Annual cost adjustment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 55-3.6 - Annual cost adjustment

State Regulations

Prior to calculating fees for the next permit year, the department shall review and finalize the actual annual cost of the environmental laboratory approval program for the previous fiscal year and compare that cost to the fees collected or anticipated to be collected for that previous fiscal year. Any difference will be reflected in an adjustment to the next annual billing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
55-3.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
